PROJECT.NAME: icHydHamu
PROJECT.TITLE: Hydroglyphus hamulatus, genomic and transcriptomic data.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project collects the genomic and transcriptomic data generated for Hydroglyphus hamulatus to facilitate genome assembly and annotation as part of the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/) and organised by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) initiative.

PROJECT.NAME: icHydHamu
PROJECT.TITLE: Hydroglyphus hamulatus, genome assembly, icHydHamu.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the genome assembly of Hydroglyphus hamulatus. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
